about-us.title: About Us
about-us.description: We are a team passionate about business, professional, and personal growth through continuing education. We believe in the power of teamwork and leadership training to achieve the best results.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.text: Building leadership in people to expand a community of successful independent entrepreneurs, providing tools and support to those who want to transform their lives through conscious, responsible, and intelligent entrepreneurship.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.text: To become the leading team in Latin America, with the best sustainable business and personal development network over time. To help people improve their lifestyle and quality of life, while expanding the company into a wide territory of opportunities for all members of our community of IBO's.

cta.title: Want to join us?
cta.description: You are just one click away from learning how to build a business with the support of our community.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Do you have any questions or proposals? We're paying attention.
